metadata.title: CVE-2019-15752 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Docker Desktop Community Edition before 2.1.0.1 allows local users to gainprivileges by placing a Trojan horse docker-credential-wincred.exe file in%PROGRAMDATA%\DockerDesktop\version-bin\ as a low-privilege user, and thenwaiting for an admin or service user to authenticate with Docker, restartDocker, or run 'docker login' to force the command.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
